actions.recommendation: If liver enzymes remain elevated a liver ultrasound is indicated.
Moderate to severe difficulty with lung function test, if symptomatic please discuss with family doctor.

Abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep.
Abnormal cycles: Blood tests such as FSH, thyroid function, prolactin levels. Also consider lifestyle factors such as stress, excessive exercise, poor nutrition, and changes in body weight.
